items.usageDialoge:
You clean your plots with the rake. It looks nice and organized.
Your next plantations will have 5% less time to harvest.

You prepare your plots with the hoe. They are deep enough to make roots in the moistest layer of your soil.
Your plots will reduce production time by 15%

Spread a small portion of fertilizer on your plots. Nourish your crops by making their growth somewhat accelerated.
Your next crops will have 15% less production time

Spread a good portion of fertilizer on your plots. Nourish your crops by making their growth somewhat accelerated.
Your next crops will have 30% less production time

Spread a great portion of fertilizer on your plots. Nourish your crops by making their growth somewhat accelerated.
Your next crops will have 50% less production time
You nourish your plants with rich water to make them hydrated and strong during the seasons. You reduce 30% of time to collect your crops.
You give your human effort to create a hole deep enough to plant your crops. you speed up 10% of the cultivation time.
The shovel has been used to remove the invasive weeds from your cared for plants. This action gives your plants a 20% acceleration
A little safe item to make you immune from the raiders!
A great item to make you immune from the raiders!
You feels the Token. It has some marks as a roullete. Use it with the Roullete.
This Old Box has something inside... Let's check it out!
A little hard... But it has something inside. Let's check it out!
This box belongs to an old ship, but it ended up sinking. It has something inside. Let's see how it goes.
The spatial blessing brings together the 4 crystal fruits once again and with this it has formed a box that for thousands of light years is a kind of chest with things sent.
